languages.text: {n}Подняв взгляд на вас, Авель долго молчит, а затем прячет взгляд и скованно изрекает:{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все".
{n}Abel looks up at you. After a lengthy silence, he looks away and says stiffly,{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."
languages.original_text: {n}Подняв взгляд на вас, Авель долго молчит, а затем прячет взгляд и скованно изрекает:{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все".

languages.text: {n}アベルがあなたを見上げる。長い沈黙の後、彼は視線を逸らして堅苦しく告げた。{/n}「万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包む」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks up at you. After a lengthy silence, he looks away and says stiffly,{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルがあなたを見上げる。長い沈黙の後、彼は視線を逸らして堅苦しく告げた。{/n}「万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包む」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯抬起头看着你。沉默了很久之后，他移开了视线，僵硬地说了一句。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks up at you. After a lengthy silence, he looks away and says stiffly,{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯抬起头看着你。沉默了很久之后，他移开了视线，僵硬地说了一句。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel blickt zu dir auf. Nach längerem Schweigen wendet er den Blick ab und sagt steif:{/n} "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, begreift alles."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks up at you. After a lengthy silence, he looks away and says stiffly,{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel blickt zu dir auf. Nach längerem Schweigen wendet er den Blick ab und sagt steif:{/n} "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, begreift alles."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel lève les yeux vers vous. Après un long silence, il se détourne et prend la parole d'un ton pincé :{/n} « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks up at you. After a lengthy silence, he looks away and says stiffly,{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel lève les yeux vers vous. Après un long silence, il se détourne et prend la parole d'un ton pincé :{/n} « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel te mira. Al cabo de un largo silencio, aparta la mirada y te saluda con formalidad.{/n} «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks up at you. After a lengthy silence, he looks away and says stiffly,{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel te mira. Al cabo de un largo silencio, aparta la mirada y te saluda con formalidad.{/n} «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel, başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Uzun bir sessizliğin ardından gözlerini çevirip sertçe konuşuyor.{/n} "Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks up at you. After a lengthy silence, he looks away and says stiffly,{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Uzun bir sessizliği ardından gözlerini çeviriyor ve katı bir şekilde konuşuyor:{/n} "Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
